sources.title: We Have Always Lived in the Castle (2018) Sisters. Secrets. A deadly homecoming.
sources.description:
Merricat, Constance and their Uncle Julian live in isolation after experiencing a family tragedy six years earlier. When cousin Charles arrives to steal the family fortune, he also threatens a dark secret they've been hiding

Original title: We Have Always Lived in the Castle
Alternative titles: Includes Siempre hemos vivido en el castillo (Spanish), Nous avons toujours vécu dans le château (French), and Ми завжди жили в замку (Ukrainian).

Director: Stacie Passon
Writers: Mark Kruger (screenplay), Shirley Jackson (based on the novel by)

Main cast:
Taissa Farmiga - Merricat Blackwood
Alexandra Daddario - Constance Blackwood
Crispin Glover - Uncle Julian
Sebastian Stan - Charles Blackwood
Paula Malcomson - Mrs. Helen Clarke
Ian Toner - Arthur
Peter Coonan - Sam
Joanne Crawford - Stella
Anna Nugent - Mrs. Wright


Genres: Mystery, Thriller, Drama
Release date: Premiered September 22, 2018 (LA Film Festival); wide release May 17, 2019.
Filming locations: reland.

metadata.Plot: Some castles are made by bricks. Some are made by books, But all castles stand by memories.
metadata.Actors: Amir Soltan Ahmadi, Ali Alikhani, Fatemeh Alikhani
